publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-771 Mr Jim Wallace: Abolition of Feudal Tenure etc. (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Abolition of Feudal Tenure etc. (Scotland) Bill is passed.
S1M-771 Mr Jim Wallace: Abolition of Feudal Tenure etc. (Scotland) Bill—That the Parliament agrees that the Abolition of Feudal Tenure etc. (Scotland) Bill be passed.
